column1: English Sent: India is a large landmass formed during different geological periods which has influenced her relief.
Hindi Tansl: BArawa eka viSAla BUBAga hE; isakA nirmANa viBinna BUgarBIya kAloM ke xOrAna huA hE
column2: jisane isake uccAvacoM ko praBAviwa kiyA hE.

column1: Anu Translation:  BArawa alaga alaga BUvijFAnI avaXi ke xOrAna jinhoMne usakI rAhawa ko praBAviwa kiyA hE banAyA huA aXika lEndmEsa hE
K#BArawa#hE##aXika#lEndmEsa#banAyA huA#-#alaga alaga#BUvijFAnI#avaXi ke xOrAna#jinhoMne#--#praBAviwa kiyA hE#usakI#rAhawa ko
